about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Kody Technolab Limited provides software development services to a diverse set of industries.

The company provides Staff Augmentation, ML Development, AR Development and Implementation, Enterprise Mobility, CX Strategy and Design, Digital Transformation, Business Analytics and intelligence, Artificial Intelligence Robotics IT Consulting, Mobile and Web App Development, Internet of Things (IoT) services, and IT consulting services.

As of June 2023, the Company has over 106 employees, comprising developers, designers, project managers, and quality assurance specialists.

For the year ended March 31, 2023, Kody Tech's Total Income and Restated Profit after tax were Rs. 1109.10 Lakhs and Rs. 318.09 Lakhs. For the year ended March 31, 2022, the company's Total Income and Restated Profit after tax were Rs. 384.20 Lakhs and Rs. 62.13 Lakhs, as compared to the Total Income and Restated Profit after tax of Rs. 248.16 Lakhs and Rs. (10.80) Lakhs respectively, over the previous year ended i.e. March 31, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the Kody Technolab IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kody Technolab IPO is a SME IPO of 1720000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹27.52 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹160 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2023, and closes on September 20, 2023.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kody Technolab IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kody Technolab IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kody Technolab IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kody Technolab IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kody Technolab IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kody Technolab IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kody Technolab IPO opens on September 15, 2023 and closes on September 20, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kody Technolab IPO?
faqs.answer: Kody Technolab IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kody Technolab IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kody Technolab IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kody Technolab IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kody Technolab IPO will be done on Monday, September 25, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 27, 2023. Check the Kody Technolab IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kody Technolab IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kody Technolab IPO listing date is on Wednesday, September 27, 2023.
